content: आक्षेपः {@--1@} Throwing off, tossing, pulling off, snatching away; अशुकाक्षेपविलज्जितानां <ls>Ku. 1. 14</ls>; withdrawing; <ls>Ku. 7. 95</ls>; movement, shaking; <ls>K. 13.</ls> {@--2@} Reviling, censure, blame, abuse, reproach, defiant censure; °प्रचंडत्तया <ls>U. 5. 29</ls>; विरुद्धमाक्षेपवचरिततिक्षितं <ls>Ki. 14. 25</ls>; <ls>Bh. 2. 69.</ls> {@--3@} Drawing together, attraction, diverting; कथारसस्याक्षेपसामंर्थ्यं <ls>K. 346</ls>, <ls n="K.">348</ls> power to interest. {@--4@} Distraction, allurement; विषयाक्षेपपर्यस्तबुद्धेः <ls>Bh. 3. 47</ls>, <ls n="Bh. 3.">23.</ls> {@--5@} Throwing away, giving up. {@--6@} Applying, laying on, putting in or into (as a colour); गोरोचनाक्षेपनितांतगौरैः <ls>Ku. 7. 17.</ls> {@--7@} Hinting at, reference to, taking to oneself or assuming (as the meaning of another word); स्वसिद्धये पराक्षेपः <ls>K. P. 2.</ls> {@--8@} An inference. {@--9@} A deposit. {@--10@} An objection or doubt. {@--11@} Convulsion, palpitation. {@--12@} Sustaining, as a sound. {@--13@} (In <ab>Rhet.</ab>) A figure of speech (<ab>cf.</ab> Greek paralipsis) in which something really intended to be said is apparently suppressed or denied to convey a particular meaning; आक्षेपः स्वयमुक्तस्य प्रतिषेधो विचारणात् . चंद्र संदर्शयात्मानमथवास्ति प्रियामुखम् .. <ls>Kuval.</ls> For fuller definitions and explanations see <ls>K. P. 10</ls>, <ls>S. D. 714</ls> and {%Ākṣepaprakaraṇa%} in <ls>R. G.</ls>
